abstract: Paul Sullivan's Wealth Matters column looks at an investing strategy that does not conform to the usual advice.
snippet: Paul Sullivan's Wealth Matters column looks at an investing strategy that does not conform to the usual advice.
lead_paragraph: In this week's Wealth Matters column, Paul Sullivan writes about an analysis of over two decades of data on the performance of some 300 mutual funds. The idea was to determine which funds outperformed a benchmark -- in this case, the Vanguard S.&P. 500 Index Fund -- over that time.

headline.main: A Different Sort of Investment Strategy
